com.example.suberduberuber.ViewModels

Class PaymentViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
        • com.example.suberduberuber.ViewModels.PaymentViewModel

  • public class PaymentViewModel
extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
    This is a viewmodel class to handle the payment for the rider side of the app. It stores the rider and the driver of the scanned QR code to keep them accessible through the payment and rating fragments. The main functionalities of this viewmodel are to update complete transactions between a rider and driver.
